documentation.text:
@dev Interface proposal for Badge tokens
 See https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/issues/1238
@dev Emitted when `amount` tokens of token type `id` are minted to `to` by `minter`.
@dev Equivalent to multiple {MintSingle} events, where `minter` and `to` is the same for all token types
@dev Emitted when `amount` tokens of token type `id` owned by `owner` are burned by `burner`.
@dev Equivalent to multiple {BurnSingle} events, where `owner` and `burner` is the same for all token types
@dev Returns the balance of `account` for a batch of token `ids`

@dev Returns the balance of multiple `accounts` for a batch of token `ids`.
 This is equivalent to calling {balanceOfBatch} for several accounts in just one call.
 Reuirements:
 - `accounts` and `ids` must have the same length.

devdoc.details: Interface proposal for Badge tokens See https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/issues/1238

BurnBatch(address,address,uint256[],uint.details: Equivalent to multiple {BurnSingle} events, where `owner` and `burner` is the same for all token types

BurnSingle(address,address,uint256,uint2.details: Emitted when `amount` tokens of token type `id` owned by `owner` are burned by `burner`.

MintBatch(address,address,uint256[],uint.details: Equivalent to multiple {MintSingle} events, where `minter` and `to` is the same for all token types

MintSingle(address,address,uint256,uint2.details: Emitted when `amount` tokens of token type `id` are minted to `to` by `minter`.

balanceOf(address,uint256).details: Returns the amount of tokens of token type `id` owned by `account`. Requirements: - `account` cannot be the zero address.

balanceOfBatch(address,uint256[]).details: Returns the balance of `account` for a batch of token `ids`

balanceOfBundle(address[],uint256[][]).details: Returns the balance of multiple `accounts` for a batch of token `ids`. This is equivalent to calling {balanceOfBatch} for several accounts in just one call. Reuirements: - `accounts` and `ids` must have the same length.
